A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nearly all lifelong Star Wars fans are disappointed after seeing The Last Jedi. The Force Awakens was a near perfect set-up\, yet they somehow managed to ruin it all. Luke Skywalker plays a stubborn old man who doesn't want to leave the island. If he didn't want to go anywhere\, why did he leave a map to his location? People are arguing this\, but it's quite obvious he did. Then he finally leaves the island right! Nope! Wrong again! He cuts himself off from the force\, but then somehow has the power to force project himself to another planet to fool Kylo Ren. This movie was a huge disappointment.
